metadata.title: CVE-2023-38318 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenNDS before 10.1.3. It fails to sanitize thegateway FQDN entry in the configuration file, allowing attackers that havedirect or indirect access to this file to execute arbitrary OS commands.

criterions.comment: opennds package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
